title: Forest Lullaby
author: Lyra Stone
pages: Under the canopy, emerald and vast, the forest sings of ages past. Leaves rustle in a whispered rhyme, telling tales as old as time.
Sunbeams filter through the trees, orchestrating light with the breeze. Shadows dance in playful might, weaving dreams within the light.
In the moss, life takes root, and branches sway like nature's flute. Songs of birds fill the morning air, in this realm where the wild lay bare.
Through the woods, a spirit roams, calling the forest its timeless home. In every rustle, a lullaby sings, cherished by nature's gentle wings.
